messages.1000075128:

Summon a cursed puppet for each #yStigmatized#w enemy and #yCurse#w all enemies within 5m upon summoning. Attacking the puppet damages #yStigmatized#w enemies. Cursed puppet has similar stats as its target. However, targets will take extra damage.
